title: A Magical Christmas
features: Little Mouse shares the excitement of Christmas but wants to know what IS the magic of Christmas? One by one his family members tell him about baking cookies, building snowmen, wrapping presents, singing carols, making decorations and decorating the tree. Then when Christmas day arrives Mommy tells Little Mouse what the magic of Christmas truly is.
description: PreSchool-Grade 2–Little Mouse asks his relatives about the magic of Christmas, and they all have different explanations, depending on their particular perspective. 'It's sitting indoors,' says Grandpa, 'where the fire will thaw your cold toes.' 'It's stringing the tree lights,' says Daddy, 'that twinkle and glow through the night.' Told in undistinguished rhymes and sweetly illustrated with an abundance of glitter, this book is more appropriate as a gift purchase for adults looking for a sentimental, secular holiday title than for most collections.
–Virginia Walter, University of California, Los Angeles
